title: Emmerdale
text: Aaron is forced to save Robert. Victoria's future hangs in the balance. Ross Punishes Jai.

title: Emmerdale
text: It is Victoria and Adam's wedding day. Aaron makes a shocking discovery. Priya races to stop Rakesh.

title: Emmerdale
text: Victoria and Adam reveal the truth to Cain. Priya gives Rakesh an ultimatum. Carly confronts Bob about his interference.

title: Emmerdale
text: Moira is desperate to find Adam and Victoria. Priya uncovers Rakesh's lie. Carly's grand opening goes awry.
